name: Material Design
author: Alkaline Thunder
description: Mobile-friendly Material Design theme for wtf-pwa written using Vuetify.  Supports dark theme toggle and responsive layout for desktop and mobile.  This is the default system layout.

menus.name: Primary Navigation
menus.description: The navigation menu shown in the page header area (desktop) and App Drawer (mobile).

menus.name: Footer 1
menus.description: A vertical navigation menu displayed on the left side of the footer.

menus.name: Footer 2
menus.description: A vertical navigation menu displayed in the middle of the footer.

menus.name: Footer 3
menus.description: A vertical navigation menu displayed on the right side of the footer.
